message: Thank you Holo Myth for everything you've really helped me out throughout this year, I love you Holo Myth
Happy 1st year anniversary Kiara! Thank you so much for the past year!! Hope to see you on a stage live someday!! <3
It is a year! Thank you for these valuable 12 months~ HoloMyth has a radiant eternal sun, keep having fun and living new experiences, here we will be looking forward to the next few years to go!
This year has been an absolute blast!

Kiara. You have done so much for me that I can never repay. This last year has truly been one of the best in my life. I learned to smile again. To laugh. To create things with my hands... To love. Thank you for being my inspiration, my muse, and for working so hard to be there for me, and all KFP.
Happy anniversary to HoloMyth, thank you giving me so much fun!!
